entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 28.
